titlestmt.titleproper: American Security and Trust Company Washington, DC Metropolitan Area Property Photographs CollectionP009

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-10-01 16:24:16 -0400.

did.unittitle: American Security and Trust Company Washington, DC Metropolitan Area Property Photographs Collection

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: The origin of this collection is not documented. However, it is assumed that an American Security and Trust Company or an affiliated organization or person donated the photographs.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
Collection consists of 260 3" x 3" Black and White photographs of the exterior of certain properties with the date and owner's name identified. Most of the photographs are of properties in all four quadrants of the District. There are a few photographs from the Maryland suburbs of Silver Spring, Bethesda, and Chevy Chase and Arlington, Virginia. Most addresses consist of one photograph but many addresses have multiple images, including some interiors. Buildings represented include both commercial and residential properties. Of note are photographs of Peoples Drug Store locations (indicated by *).
It is suggested that if an address is not listed, check the photograph of a nearby address to possibly see a portion of the desired address.
